column1: Enable the LDP flag to comply with obligations under CCPA and CPRA when using Pinterest's ad service. Learn more
column2: Enable the LDP flag to comply with obligations under CCPA and CPRA when using Pinterest's ad service. Learn more

column1: Turn on Pinterest tag and Pinterest Conversions API
column2: Turn on Pinterest tag and Pinterest Conversions API

column1: Turn off Pinterest tag and Pinterest Conversions API
column2: Turn off Pinterest tag and Pinterest Conversions API

column2: Enable Tracking if Cookie Exists and not false

column1: Client ID for Pinterest. This is used to identify Adobe Commerce/Magento clients on Pinterest.
column2: Client ID for Pinterest. This is used to identify Adobe Commerce/Magento clients on Pinterest.

column1: Send clientside and serverside conversion events. To update this setting, disconnect and reconnect your Pinterest business account to Adobe Commerce.
column2: Send clientside and serverside conversion events. To update this setting, disconnect and reconnect your Pinterest business account to Adobe Commerce.

column1: Manually run catalog creation and feed registration
column2: Manually run catalog creation and feed registration

column1: This option integrates with CookieBot CMS to check if the user has accepted cookies. The app listens to CookiebotOnConsentReady/CookiebotOnLoad events and checks Cookiebot.consent.marketing value to be true. For more details refer to the cookiebot documentation.
column2: This option integrates with CookieBot CMS to check if the user has accepted cookies. The app listens to CookiebotOnConsentReady/CookiebotOnLoad events and checks Cookiebot.consent.marketing value to be true. For more details refer to the cookiebot documentation.

column1: Provide a custom cookie name to check. Disable user tracking if the value is falsy. i.e null, undefined, false or 0
column2: Provide a custom cookie name to check. Disable user tracking if the value is falsy. i.e null, undefined, false or 0

column1: Tracking is controlled at Stores > Configuration > General > Web > Default Cookie Settings > Cookie Restriction Mode
column2: Tracking is controlled at Stores > Configuration > General > Web > Default Cookie Settings > Cookie Restriction Mode
